title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: The label font size doesn't change immediately after modification.
OB: Upon modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label remains the same.
EB: Expected Behavior: When changing the font size of a label, the height of the label should adjust accordingly to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
3. Observe that the height of the label does not change to match the new font size.
